species.name: sinistea
descriptions: The teacup in which this Pokémon makes its home is a famous piece of antique tableware. Many forgeries are in circulation.
This Pokémon is said to have been born when a lonely spirit possessed a cold, leftover cup of tea.

abilities.name: weak-armor
abilities.effect: Raises Speed and lowers Defense by one stage each upon being hit by a physical move.

abilities.name: cursed-body
abilities.effect: Has a 30% chance of Disabling any move that hits the Pokémon.
